title: Personal Website
description: I built this portfolio/website using Astro, SolidJS, and Tailwind. This project helped me improve my web development skills.

title: RhodesAPI
description: A RESTful API for Arknights that provides information about operators. The API also includes a documentation website built with Svelte.

title: Package Tracker
description: Hackathon winner for Transport Hacks, a web app to track your packages across various carriers. My role was expansive, doing Firebase setup and large parts of the front-end.

title: Holoboard
description: A web app to monitor the streamers of HoloEN, through a live status tracker, theater board, and sub tracker.

title: Picatso
description: A full-stack web app that lets you create cat art with DALLE-2 and share them with the community.
